response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your specific needs. This product holds immense value to me, but recognizing its worth to you is paramount. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $9,500 for you to experience all its features. I believe this is a fair deal that respects both the value I place on the product and the value you see in it. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information about the product. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 9500}
